display_help: The Apparitions are embodiments of hatred and anger given form. In addition to the standard resistances exhibited by others of their kind, merged forms and more powerful Apparitions have resistance to being held, slept or confused.
display_target_help: The Apparitions are embodiments of hatred and anger given form. In addition to the standard resistances exhibited by others of their kind, merged forms and more powerful Apparitions have resistance to being held, slept or confused.
